short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows a warning banner on the page when visiting a specified set of URLS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thanks to Edward Wang for improved CSS resets and preventing duplicated banners, and Michael Lefkowitz for adding the ability to move the banner to the bottom.
